thread.title: Arsenal fans react to Luis Enrique quitting as Barcelona coach… by begging Arsene Wenger to go
thread.title_full: Arsenal fans react to Luis Enrique quitting as Barcelona coach… by begging Arsene Wenger to go

author: Richard Innes
title: Arsenal fans react to Luis Enrique quitting as Barcelona coach… by begging Arsene Wenger to go
text:
Sport Arsenal fans react to Luis Enrique quitting as Barcelona coach… by begging Arsene Wenger to go Gooners everywhere react to the news that there is to be a managerial vacancy at the Nou Camp in crushingly predictable fashion Share Arsenal fans have made good use of Enrique's announcement (Photo: Arsenal FC/Getty Images) Share Get Arsenal FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The ability of Arsenal's Wenger Out brigade to make ANY story about Arsene Wenger is increasingly remarkable. 
Regardless of the subject matter, it seems the Emirates' angriest fans always manage to find a way to turn a news report into a Wenger-related rant. 
Life on Mars discovered. "Get Wenger to go and manage there." 
Brexit reversed. "Does that mean we have to keep Wenger now?" 
Donald Trump's state visit to the UK cancelled. "Maybe we can send Wenger on a permanent visit to the US instead." (Photo: Getty Images) 
You get the idea. 
Bearing this in mind, how do you think Arsenal angrier supporters have reacted to the news that Luis Enrique is to leave Barcelona at the end of the season? How do you imagine the Gunners' army of keyboard warriors have responded to the confirmation that there will be a managerial vacancy at the Nou Camp this summer? 
HOW DO YOU THINK? You tell 'em, mate (Photo: Alex Livesey) Yes, with crushing predictability, the Gooners of #WengerOut infamy have united… in the (probably forlorn) hope that their manager will soon be departing for Spain: Some Arsenal fans are SO #WengerOut, they are now just using any old excuse - including Enrique's announcement - to rant about how the Frenchman: Don't ever change, Arsenal fans… Like us on Facebook
